summary: A group of troubled teenagers are led by social workers on a California wilderness retreat, not knowing that the woods they are camping in have become infested by mutated, blood-sucking ticks.
cast: Rosalind Allen|Ami Dolenz|Seth Green|Virginya Keehne|Ray Oriel|Alfonso Ribeiro|Peter Scolari|Dina Dayrit|Michael Medeiros|Barry Lynch|Clint Howard|Rance Howard|Timothy Landfield|Judy Jean Berns|J.D. Stone|Colin Dean Feucaloro
title: Garrapatas
